reviewText:
This video can be used with whatever bible translation you choose or prefer.  It's always good to be diligent and compare notes.

to watch FREE go to

jw dot org
on the bottom right corner click on "watch sign language videos"
(can choose which sign language you prefer)
This video is about midaway through!

go to jw dot org
on the bottom right corner click "watch sign language videos"
You can choose which sign language you speak
This video is about midway through the page
click to watch or download

ALSO if you just want an actual copy you can request it from any of Jehovah's Witnesses FREE OR use the request a bible study form to be contacted at the bottom of jw dot org so you can be contacted and ask for this video

It did not say which version of the Bible it is. If this is the New World Translation, do NOT buy this! The New World Translation does NOT follow the Christian Bible! They have changed parts of it, which is in DIRECT violation of God.

Revelations 22:19 And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from the things which are written in this book.
